post.author: Admin
post.title: Concert Uniform Turn In
post.description:
Dear Band Families,
It is the end of the year and time for concert uniforms to be turned in!
Gir
post.content:
Dear Band Families,

It is the end of the year and time for concert uniforms to be turned in!

Girls - Please wash your dress in cold water and line dry. Do not iron! Please return on a hanger.

Boys - TUXES WILL BE CLEANED AFTER THEY ARE TURNED IN! Do NOT take them to the cleaners. All boys - please be sure to return your tie, cummerbund and suit bag as well as your tux!

Turn-in will be in the new uniform room, room 310. The times will be as follows:

  • Monday, May 16, 6:00-8:00 pm
  • Tuesday, May 17, 6:00-8:00pm

Please contact Stacy at 440-263-1855 or Tracey at 216-533-9710 with any questions.

Thanks!
Stacy and Tracey
